scripts.install-all: cd ../frontend && echo ## INSTALLING FRONTEND DEPENDENCIES ## && npm install && cd ../server && echo ## INSTALLING BACKEND DEPENDENCIES ## && npm install
scripts.build-all: cd ../frontend && echo ## BUILDING REACT FRONTEND ## && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && echo ## BUILDING EXPRESS BACKEND ## && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-and-run-all: npm run build-all && cd dist && node index.js
